Package com.stehno.ersatz.cfg

Interface ChunkingConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChunkingConfigImpl
    public interface ChunkingConfig
    Configuration for a chunked response. The response content-type will be specified as "chunked" and the response itself will be written as partial chunks using the chunks property to determine the number of chunks, with the delay property used to determine the delay between each chunk - a range of values may be specified to cause a random delay based on a value within the range (milliseconds).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ChunkingConfig chunks​(int value)
      Used to specify the number of chunks which the response will be broken into,
      ChunkingConfig delay​(int value)
      Used to specify the delay time between each chunk, fixed to the specified milliseconds.
      ChunkingConfig delay​(groovy.lang.IntRange delayRange)
      Used to specify the delay time between each chunk as a range of millisecond values.

    • Method Detail

      • chunks

        ChunkingConfig chunks​(int value)
        Used to specify the number of chunks which the response will be broken into,
        Parameters:
        value - the number of chunks
        Returns:
        a reference to the config

      • delay

        ChunkingConfig delay​(int value)
        Used to specify the delay time between each chunk, fixed to the specified milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        value - the delay value in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a reference to the config

      • delay

        ChunkingConfig delay​(groovy.lang.IntRange delayRange)
        Used to specify the delay time between each chunk as a range of millisecond values. The actual delay value will be determined at runtime as a random value within the specified range.
        Parameters:
        delayRange - the delay value range in milliseconds
        Returns:
        a reference to the config
